query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZEAITZSDT0005 A USING (SELECT CAST(#G_MANDT# AS VARCHAR(3)) AS MANDT, CAST(#HOGI# AS VARCHAR(24)) AS HOGI, CAST(#COD# AS VARCHAR(15)) AS COD FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 )B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.HOGI = #HOGI# AND CHARACTERISTIC = #COD# AND SEQ = #SEQ# WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET HOGI = #HOGI#, CHARACTERISTIC = #COD# , VALUE = #VALUE#, APP_PROC_USID = #G_USER_ID#, APP_PROC_DATE = HEX(CURRENT DATE), APP_PROC_TIME = HEX(CURRENT TIME), APP_PROC_MSEC = MICROSECOND(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), APP_PROC_FLAG = 'C' WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ( MANDT , HOGI , CHARACTERISTIC , SEQ , VBELN , POSNR , MOWBS , CUOBJ , VALUE , APP_PROC_DATE , APP_PROC_TIME , APP_PROC_MSEC , APP_PROC_USID ,APP_PROC_FLAG ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #HOGI# , #COD# , #SEQ# , #VBELN# , #POSNR# , '' , '' , #VALUE# , HEX(CURRENT DATE) , HEX(CURRENT TIME) , MICROSECOND(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) , #G_USER_ID# , 'C' )
